title: What are some good online certification (in Computer Science) courses for grade 12 students? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can do basic coding programming course of C or Advance excel, ppt making ,or Corel draw or Adobe photoshop editing courses ,you can also do CCC or MS-CIT for all basic course package of Computer. These will be good for you . You have several sources like Udemy , unacademy ,you tube , Coursera etc.
